title: Daily Mail Comment
text: So this is it. We have arrived at the moment when Parliament can finally end this Brexit purgatory. Alternatively, they could continue to put petty politics before the national interest, condemning us to exist indefinitely in the agonising half-in, half-out limbo of the past three years. Boris Johnson, through sheer force of will and personality, has played his part in this drama stunningly well, achieving the seemingly impossible. From a standing start less than three months ago, he has banished 'the doomsters and the gloomsters' and pulled off a new Brexit deal - and before the Halloween deadline to boot. ...read
description: Daily Mail Comment Columnist Archive for MailOnline
